title: Adjectives of Positive Evaluation of Quality

data.translation: in a notably positive or exceptional manner
completely without mistakes or flaws, reaching the best possible standard
having the greatest quality
extremely good and amazing
extremely great or large
indicating excellence or high quality
extremely amazing and great
extremely great and amazing
very good in quality or other traits

surpassing others in terms of overall goodness or excellence

showing unmatched excellence and the highest level of quality or greatness

extremely good
superior to everything else that is in the same category
having exceptional beauty or excellence
extremely surprising or impressive

having an exceptionally high quality, etc.
extremely interesting or captivating
persuasive in a way that captures attention or convinces effectively
providing a sense of satisfaction or reward
full of happiness and delight
remarkably surprising or wonderful, often suggesting the presence of divine intervention
(used as an intensifier) extremely well
worth noticing, especially because of being unusual or extraordinary
possessing traits that attract people's affection

inspiring wonder or delight, as if possessing enchanting qualities

title: Adjectives of Positive Evaluation of Beauty

data.translation: extremely impressive and beautiful, often evoking awe or excitement
extremely impressive and attractive
perfect, without any mistakes, faults, or imperfections
impressive and noble, often with a grand or dignified appearance
exceptionally impressive and beautiful, often bringing joy or admiration

pleasing and likely to arouse interest or desire
incredibly impressive or beautiful, often leaving one feeling amazed
very beautiful, attractive, or impressive
beyond the usual or ordinary, often causing amazement or admiration due to its exceptional nature

without any mistakes or errors

causing admiration because of size, skill, importance, etc.

causing people to experience great interest, shock, curiosity, or excitement
